page.title: 15GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: This is a game I love to play. You play it outside. It is called B.M.Xing. You have to have a bike called a B.M.X. You can do what is called freestyle B.M.Xing. You need a special B.M.X. helmet which has padding on the inside. One stunt which you can do is what most people call a wheelie. A wheelie is when you pull on the handle bars and at the same moment press the pedal down and you should find that your front wheel goes up. Another stunt which you can do on a B.M.X. is what you call an endo. An endo is similar to a wheelie. When you do an endo you should pull the brake very hard. They should be very good brakes and if you put enough weight onto the front of your bike you should find that your back wheel goes up.
